description: This file defines a React functional component 'TodoItem' used in a to-do list application. It manages the display and editing of individual to-do items, including toggling completion, editing text, and deletion.

methods.name: TodoItem
methods.description: React component for rendering and managing a single to-do item, handles editing, toggling completion, and deletion.

methods.name: commitEdit
methods.description: Commits the edited to-do text if changed, and exits editing mode.
